Based on your preference for action game movies, I'd highly recommend "Taken" (2008). This film follows a retired CIA agent on a high-stakes mission to rescue his daughter who has been kidnapped while abroad. Liam Neeson delivers an exceptional performance as the father turned vigilante.

If you enjoy intense war action, I'd also suggest "Fury" (2014) which stars Brad Pitt as a battle-hardened tank commander leading his crew through grueling combat in World War II Germany.
